title: Chain Gun
summaries: The Chain Gun is a Hardmode, post-Plantera gun which fires bullets in random directions over a wide spread, similar to the Gatligator. Its use time of 4 makes it the fastest weapon in Terraria, and it has a 50% chance not to consume ammunition. The Chain Gun has a 5.55%–12.5% / 12.5%–50% chance to be dropped by Santa-NK1 during the Frost Moon event.
Its best modifier is Rapid. However, Godly may be preferred to save ammo.
